Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers lead the series 1-0 and can advance to the ALDS with a win.
The Astros have a 38-16 record in games when they did not allow a home run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup Wednesday is the eighth meeting between these teams this season.
The Astros have a 4-3 advantage in the season series.
Others: Yordan Alvarez leads the Astros with 35 home runs while slugging.567.
Riley Greene has 27 doubles, six triples, 24 home runs and 74 RBI for the Tigers.
